root.name: Axelay
root.description: PlotAxelay takes place in the fictional Illis Solar System, which is under attack by alien invaders known as the Armada of Annihilation, which seeks to take over the planets of Illis. The game begins on the planet Corliss, which is similar to Earth. You must take your ship, the D117B Axelay Fighter and free the planets of Illis, eventually making your way to the Fortress of the Armada of Annihilation and stop the invasion. Â TriviaIf the game is completed twice on the hardest difficulty, a message appears and promises a sequel to Axelay. However, an Axelay 2 was never released and no plans for a sequel have yet to materialize.
